More Notes: Growth rates are reduced by increases in the number of wet days and in extreme daily rainfall.
Annual total rainfall impact on economic growth rates derived from a 1-standard deviation shock.

Extreme daily rainfall impact on economic growth rates derived from a 1-standard deviation shock.
Sensitivity to annual total rainfall deviations is +62% with respect to rich countries.
Sensitivity to the number of wet days is +47% with respect to poor countries.
